title: Hollyoaks spoilers: Sienna leaves after making shocking discovery?
text:
(Picture: Lime Pictures)

It’s certainly been a challenging year for Sienna Blake (Anna Passey) in Hollyoaks, but the young woman is left devastated once more in the coming episodes when she makes a shocking discovery — and it’s one that makes her think about packing her bags and leaving the village for good.

Sienna’s not had it easy over the past couple of months. Following a series of ordeals at the hands of rapist Laurie (Kyle Pryor), she was faced with a deadly dilemma when she stumbled upon twins whom she believed to be her own, and subsequently set about arranging a plan to kidnap them. In spite of her harrowing year, Brody (Adam Woodward) was with her every step of the way — that is, until he discovered that she knew about Maxine (Nikki Sanderson) faking her illness and did nothing.

With Liberty (Jessamy Stoddart) pregnant with their child, Brody and Sienna should be over the moon, but the animosity between them is proving rather difficult for everyone involved — especially Liberty. In the coming episodes, Liberty asks Brody if he could come to the scan alongside both her and Sienna, but — after giving it some thought — he ultimately decides not to.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Fed up with the atmosphere, Liberty asks Sienna to apologise to Brody and put their feud aside for the sake of the baby. It takes quite a bit of persuasion, but Sienna ultimately agrees to do so.

However, when she heads round to The Love Boat, she’s left heartbroken, as she discovers Brody and Cindy (Stephanie Waring) together — and sparks are certainly flying between the pair.

Afterwards, a devastated Sienna informs Liberty that she doesn’t want to have a baby without Brody and thus she begins to pack her bags.

Will Sienna leave the village?

Hollyoaks continues Friday 10th October at 7pm on E4.

description: Sienna is left devastated by what she sees.
